title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point(s) earned for: correctly labeling the initial 60o angle of incidence

4 point(s) earned for: correctly drawn ray with angle of reflection or refraction labeled. (One point for each ray)

1 point(s) earned for: correctly labeling the angle of incidence at the lower interface Using Snell's law:

na sin θa = ng sin θg

1 point(s) earned for: correct substitution

1.0 sin 60o = 1.5 sin θg

1 point(s) earned for: correct value of θg

θg = 35.3o OR 0.61 rad

Note: At each interface, only one point was awarded for a correct sketch of rays with incorrect or missing angle labels.

At each interface, only one point was deducted for an incorrect sketch with correct angle labels.

title: Part B (i, ii, iii, iv)
stimulusHtml:
(i)

U sing the relationship between frequency and wavelength:

c = fλ

1 point(s) earned for : substituting the correct values in air

f a = c λ a = 3 × 10 8 m / s 5.25 × 10 − 7 m

1 point(s) earned for : the correct answer

f a = 5.71 x 10 14 Hz

(ii)

1 point(s) earned for : a correct answer

f f = 5.71 x 10 14 Hz OR indicating it's the same value as part i
λ f = λ a /n f OR Vf = c/n f and λ f = v f /f f

λ f = 5.25 × 10 − 7 m 1.38   O R   λ f = ( 3 × 10 8 m / s ) / 1.38 5.71 × 10 14 H z

(iii)

1 point(s) earned for : correctly applying one or more equations, interluding substitution

1 point(s) earned for : the correct answer, with proper units

λ f = 3.8 x 10 -7 m OR 380nm

(iv)

1 point(s) earned for : indicating the correct condition for constructive interference

2L = λf

2L = 3.8 x 10 -7 m

1 point(s) earned for : the correct answer, with proper units

L = 1.9 x 10 -7 m OR 190nm
